prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a bipedal lizard with vibrant green skin.
Show me a Pokemon with sharp claws and a leafy tail, perfect for blending into forests.
Imagine a sleek, agile creature that thrives in lush environments with a playful demeanor.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that has a striking appearance and excels in speed.
Make a character that embodies the spirit of nature with bright green colors and dynamic poses.
Give me a Pokemon that can camouflage in the wild, featuring a unique blend of greens.
Design a fierce-looking creature with a slender body and sharp features, ideal for swift attacks.
